I would rely on my sense of direction and use landmarks to guide me. I would also ask for directions from locals or other people I encounter on my journey.
I would use a compass and a sextant to navigate by the stars and the sun.
I would use my phone to call a friend or family member to get directions or to use a GPS app to guide me.
I would use my intuition and rely on my experience to guide me. I would pay attention to the terrain, the wind, and other environmental cues to help me navigate.
I would use a combination of all the above methods, relying on my sense of direction, landmarks, and other resources to help me find my way.
